DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study characterize subject ' response spinal cord stimulation postural change .
DOC.criteria: Be ambulatory Be 18 year age old Have chronic low back pain and/or leg pain due neuropathic cause Be implant Restore Restore Advanced system great equal 3 month Be implant percutaneous thoracic lead Have stable pain control Adjust stimulation parameter manually regular basis Be willing able complete protocol requirement Be willing able provide write informed consent Be male nonpregnant female Plan enroll another clinical study participation study , currently enrol another clinical study Be morbidly obese Had painrelated surgery previous 12 week enrollment intend undergo surgery period study
